mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.title AS "title", a.remote_addr AS "remoteAddr", a.request_uri AS "requestUri", a.request_type AS "requestType", a.method AS "method", a.params AS "params", a.result AS "result", a.user_agent AS "userAgent", a.exception AS "exception", a.record_time AS "recordTime", a.create_date AS "createDate", u.id AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", c.name AS "createBy.companyDTO.name", o.name AS "createBy.officeDTO.name" FROM sys_log a left JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by left JOIN sys_office c ON c.id = u.company_id left JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u.office_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
